data_usage: The data were plotted as a time series of temperature anomalies (relative to 1901-1960) from 1900-2012.
methodology:
1. Temperature anomalies were created by subtracting the 1901-1960 average temperature was from the annual temperature values.
2. The temperature anomalies were plotted as a time series from 1900 to 2012.
output_artifacts:
MM_weighted_avg_a1b_temp.sum
MM_weighted_avg_a2_temp.sum
MM_weighted_avg_b1_temp.sum
Fig24_CMIP3.xlsx
2-4_a.png
CS_average annual temp_global_V7.png
